channel.title: [PI] FrostfireScape - | Vote Reward | Economy Server | Custom Boss | Skilling |
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt][b]Welcome to FrostfireScape![/b][/size] [size=12pt]Where Legends Die, But Also Exist.[/size]
First i'd like to say that this server just started and dont and i repeat dont be harsh hehe, Anyways i made some pictures of the server. Everything works fine as far as i know now i just need soem regular players to hop in and have some fun. This server is 24/7 hosted, NO LAGG and 20/7 Support unlike other servers on the website we also got Live support you will be able to talk with an Admin or other staff members of FrostfireScape about your problem in or outside the game!
Maybe i do sound a little unproffesional but thats just because i dont like those standard advertisements, just be who you are! We just have to make fun! thats all! Also our staff is very helpfull and not such assholes that you maybe met in other servers, we can understand you in very different ways. and we are glad if we can help you out! EVEN if YOU did something wrong. We can always figure something out!
[size=18pt]PS.. Looking for a couple of ingame and outgame staffmembers.[/size]
[img]http://ftpcontent.worldnow.com/wgem/custom/2010/resource/icons/homepage.gif[/img][url=http://www.frostfirescape.com]Website[/url] [img]http://s4.postimage.org/31ieldkkk/webclient.png[/img][url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/76045612/FrostfireScape%20-%20Release.rar] Client[/url] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img][url=http://www.frostfirescape.com/forums/] Forums[/url] [img]http://s4.postimage.org/31ieldkkk/webclient.png[/img][url=http://frostfirescape.com/webclient.html] Play now![/url]
[size=24pt]Features[/size]
[center][table][tr][td][img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] 100% all Special attacks [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] Live Support on homepage [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] Custom made boss (Fareed's church) [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] 99% Turmoil (Gfx Missing) [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] Pest Control [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] Slayer point system (with point shop) [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] Eco Server [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] New Home added [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] Thief Stalls for cash (remember its eco server so cash there is slow) [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] Lunar/Ancient/Normal Spellbooks (importand spells working) [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] Firecape obtainable trough JAD or Slayer point System [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] Vesta/Statius [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] Chaotic Weapons [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] Donate System (Ranks) [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] Donate Home (The ability to get your own home, with a custom layout and teleport that is only working for you) [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] Donate Client (Custom Made Client for donaters made by Developement Team) [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] Clan chat [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] ::yell for everyone with icons [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] Level 99 notice server wide [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] Barrows [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] Duel Arena [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] 90% Farming skill (fixed alot if gfx movements) [img]http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f382/kittypryde1709/bth_gold.gif[/img] Basic/Custom made Godwars (Hard)[/center] [b] Please enjoy and hopefully we see you soon! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [b][size=24pt]New home![/size][/b]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img4/7683/dtry.png[/img]
[b][size=24pt]Turmoil![/size][/b]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img6/3576/jd7z.png[/img]
[b][size=24pt]Thief Stalls![/size][/b]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img407/3082/5mqv.png[/img]
[b][size=24pt]Ags spec (all specs work 100%)[/size][/b]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img16/402/e3vp.png[/img]
[b][size=24pt]Lunar/Ancient/Normal Spellbook![/size][/b]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img542/3884/b0s0.png[/img]
[/center][/td][/tr][/table]

item.title: [PI] FrostfireScape - | Vote Reward | Economy Server | Custom Boss | Skilling |
item.dc:creator: @zeldanoob zeldanoob
item.description:
@zeldanoob wrote:

Bump!

Edited the Post with new links.

Registered a Domain and got my basic website setup.
The android app will be done soon, probally at 9/5/2013 - 21:00
Hopefully i informed you guys enough if not please contact me!

Added features to the new post aswell
Have fun!

  • Deluxe, Owner of FrostfireScape
What makes this unique? <-- [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=550286]Coldmedicine[/url]

Well Currently we are developing a Android application for the server, that will include news and such. i think that is kinda unique right
Also we got the Live Support on our website where you can open up a chat window with one of the staff members, i cannot name a server that got that, maybe there is but i dont know <3

Read full topic

item.source: [PI] FrostfireScape - | Vote Reward | Economy Server | Custom Boss | Skilling |

item.title: [PI] FrostfireScape - | Vote Reward | Economy Server | Custom Boss | Skilling |
item.dc:creator: @zeldanoob zeldanoob
item.description:
@zeldanoob wrote:

[quote=“Java-RSPS-Noob, post:4, topic:529094”]Talked to the programmer today for a little while. I get the feeling he knows some java maybe not be like “l33t programmer” but he does know some stuff.

Gave him a few suggestions and I wish the server luck. At least he is attempting updates which is always a ++ in my book. As long as he is willing to learn I can’t really say something negative.

Only advice I can really give from playing is to check for dupes/and cheat engine dupes, and to also validate your packets. I can already see duping becoming a nightmare on here from looking at how old the base is.[/quote]

hehe thanks for the feedback man and thanks for telling me about some glitches

Also what makes this server unique ? Well the staffmembers are the most polite people in-game muhaha
No but really we are really soft and we do not judge people to soon, but we have our rules so watch it
Also we are busy with creating our own unique things in-game so watch out

Hope to see you all in-game
Enjoy!

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] FrostfireScape - | Vote Reward | Economy Server | Custom Boss | Skilling |

item.title: [PI] FrostfireScape - | Vote Reward | Economy Server | Custom Boss | Skilling |
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

Talked to the programmer today for a little while. I get the feeling he knows some java maybe not be like “l33t programmer” but he does know some stuff.

Gave him a few suggestions and I wish the server luck. At least he is attempting updates which is always a ++ in my book. As long as he is willing to learn I can’t really say something negative.

Only advice I can really give from playing is to check for dupes/and cheat engine dupes, and to also validate your packets. I can already see duping becoming a nightmare on here from looking at how old the base is.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @zeldanoob zeldanoob
item.description:
@zeldanoob wrote:

[center][size=36pt]Welcome to FrostfireScape![/size]
[size=12pt]Where Legends Die, But Also Exist.[/size]

First i’d like to say that this server just started and dont and i repeat dont be harsh hehe, Anyways i made some pictures of the server.
Everything works fine as far as i know now i just need soem regular players to hop in and have some fun.
This server is 24/7 hosted, NO LAGG and 20/7 Support unlike other servers on the website we also got Live support you will be able to talk with an
Admin or other staff members of FrostfireScape about your problem in or outside the game!

Maybe i do sound a little unproffesional but thats just because i dont like those standard advertisements, just be who you are!
We just have to make fun! thats all!
Also our staff is very helpfull and not such assholes that you maybe met in other servers, we can understand you in very different ways.
and we are glad if we can help you out! EVEN if YOU did something wrong. We can always figure something out!

[size=18pt]PS… Looking for a couple of ingame and outgame staffmembers.[/size]

Website
Client
Forums
Play now!

[size=24pt]Features[/size]

[center][table][tr][td] 100% all Special attacks
Live Support on homepage
Custom made boss (Fareed’s church)
99% Turmoil (Gfx Missing)
Pest Control
Slayer point system (with point shop)
Eco Server
New Home added
Thief Stalls for cash (remember its eco server so cash there is slow)
Lunar/Ancient/Normal Spellbooks (importand spells working)
Firecape obtainable trough JAD or Slayer point System
Vesta/Statius
Chaotic Weapons
Donate System (Ranks)
Donate Home (The ability to get your own home, with a custom layout and teleport that is only working for you)
Donate Client (Custom Made Client for donaters made by Developement Team)
Clan chat
::yell for everyone with icons
Level 99 notice server wide
Barrows
Duel Arena
90% Farming skill (fixed alot if gfx movements)
Basic/Custom made Godwars (Hard)[/center]
[b]
Please enjoy and hopefully we see you soon!

[size=24pt]New home![/size]

[size=24pt]Turmoil![/size]

[size=24pt]Thief Stalls![/size]

[size=24pt]Ags spec (all specs work 100%)[/size]

[size=24pt]Lunar/Ancient/Normal Spellbook![/size]

[/center][/td][/tr][/table]
